findings.title: Unmet condition in burnTokensForSale()
findings.description: The burnTokensForSale() function has a require statement that checks if tokens > 0, but this condition will never be met when all tokens are sold because finalizeAndBurn() burns tokens first and then finalizes the sale, preventing investors from transferring their tokens.

findings.title: No medium severity issues are found.
findings.description: The audit report did not identify any medium severity issues.

findings.title: Solidity version should be fixed in smart contracts
findings.description: The Solidity version used in the smart contract should be fixed to a specific version instead of using a range (e.g., pragma solidity 0.4.24 instead of pragma solidity ^0.4.24)

findings.title: Transfer Events are not emitted in activateSaleContract() function
findings.description: The activateSaleContract() function in the token contract does not emit transfer events.
